sentence.Network_en: Round the north - east of the Black and Caspian Seas were coming the Medes and Persians.
sentence.Network_cn: 从黑海和里海的东北部来了米堤亚人和波斯人.

sentence.Network_en: According to Herodotus, the Magi were the sacred caste of the Medes.
sentence.Network_cn: 依照希罗多德所说, 祭司(魔法师)是米提亚人的宗教阶层.

sentence.Network_en: PERES; Thy kingdom is divided, and given to the Medes and Persians.
sentence.Network_cn: 毗勒斯(乌法珥新 同义 )就是你的国分裂, 归与玛代人和波斯人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 前612年，新巴比伦和米底（Medes）两国联合攻占和摧毁了亚述帝国首都尼尼微（Nineveh）。 前609年，亚述帝国灭亡，迎来大约7…
